dict.string: LifeTunes uses your location to create personalized, location-based music playlists and mood tracking. Specifically: 1) Generate geo-tuned playlists that match your surroundings (for example, relaxing nature sounds when you're in a park, upbeat workout music when you're at the gym, or focus music when you're in a library), 2) Create a personalized mood map by recording where you log your emotions to help you identify patterns between locations and your wellbeing, and 3) Provide location-specific music recommendations based on the time of day and your current environment.

LifeTunes sends you daily wellness reminders and motivational challenges to help maintain your mental health routine. For example, you'll receive a gentle reminder at 7 PM to log your mood or a motivational quote to start your day.
